PROJECT.NAME: qqRhoMagi
PROJECT.TITLE: Rhode magnifica, genomic and transcriptomic data.
PROJECT.DESCRIPTION: This project collects the genomic and transcriptomic data generated for Rhode magnifica to facilitate genome assembly and annotation as part of the Biodiversity Genomics Europe project (BGE, https://biodiversitygenomics.eu/) and organised by the European Reference Genome Atlas (ERGA, https://www.erga-biodiversity.eu/) initiative.

PROJECT.NAME: qqRhoMagi1
PROJECT.TITLE: Rhode magnifica, genome assembly, qqRhoMagi1.
PROJECT.DESCRIPTION: This project provides the genome assembly of Rhode magnifica. The assembly is provided by the European Reference Genome Atlas (ERGA, https://www.erga-biodiversity.eu/) via the Biodiversity Genomics Europe project (BGE, https://biodiversitygenomics.eu/).
